com.mygdx.game

Class Communicator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.game.Communicator

  • public class Communicator
extends java.lang.Object
    the purpose of this class is to translate from the protocol used to communicate over the network to model and translate model changes to the network protocol. By network protocol I don't mean the network part of the stack, I mean JSON messages sent over TCP Changes in the local player will result be translated into network messages by this class Network messages about changes in the game's model on the server side will be translated into local model changes by this class
    Author:
    elimonent

      boolean connectToServer(java.net.InetAddress serverAddress, int port, java.lang.String username)
      connects to a server.
      void receiveMessage()
      receive message from server and take the appropriate action based on the message basically a huge case statement/demultiplexer at this time
      boolean sendChatMessage(java.lang.String message)
      send a message to appear in the chat box to the other players
      void sendLocalPlayerDirection()
      send the local player's direction to the server aka translate the local representation of the player's direction into a network message
      void sendLocalPlayerPosition()
      used by the localplayer class to send updates about their position when it changes (aka when the user moves their avatar)
      boolean setReady(boolean ready)
      When players are waiting in the lobby/party setup page for the game to start, they can choose to be ready to start or unready This function lets the server know a player's ready status
      void setStage(ExtendedStage stage)

    • Method Detail

      • connectToServer

        public boolean connectToServer(java.net.InetAddress serverAddress,
                               int port,
                               java.lang.String username)
        connects to a server. After calling this function, the communicator's communication will all be between it and this server
        Parameters:
        serverAddress - server IP address
        port - server port
        username - the username to connect with
        Returns:
        whether the connection was successful

      • sendChatMessage

        public boolean sendChatMessage(java.lang.String message)
        send a message to appear in the chat box to the other players
        Parameters:
        message - the message that will appear in the chat next to this player's name
        Returns:
        whether the message was delivered successfully

      • setReady

        public boolean setReady(boolean ready)
        When players are waiting in the lobby/party setup page for the game to start, they can choose to be ready to start or unready This function lets the server know a player's ready status
        Parameters:
        ready -
        Returns:
        true if successfully sent status to server

      • sendLocalPlayerPosition

        public void sendLocalPlayerPosition()
        used by the localplayer class to send updates about their position when it changes (aka when the user moves their avatar)
        Parameters:
        pos - the new position of the player

      • sendLocalPlayerDirection

        public void sendLocalPlayerDirection()
        send the local player's direction to the server aka translate the local representation of the player's direction into a network message

        receive message from server and take the appropriate action based on the message basically a huge case statement/demultiplexer at this time
